title: Sri Lanka should have gone to IMF much earlier – President
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa says he believes that Sri Lanka should have gone for an IMF programme much earlier.
He stated this while addressing the newly-appointed Cabinet ministers at the President’s House this morning (18), the PMD reported.
He also said that not providing chemical fertilizer to farmers was a mistake and that the government will provide chemical fertilizer once again.
